short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search and switch between open tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Tab Search: Effortlessly Navigate Your Browser Tabs

Are you drowning in a sea of open tabs? Quick Tab Search is your lifeline to efficient browsing. This powerful extension allows you to instantly search and switch between your open tabs with just a few keystrokes.

Key Features:
• Lightning-fast tab search: Find any open tab in seconds by searching titles or URLs.
• Keyboard-friendly navigation: Use arrow keys to browse results and Enter to switch tabs.
• Visual tab list: See favicons and titles for easy identification.
• Dark mode support: Toggle between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing.
• Keyboard shortcut: Open the search with Ctrl+Shift+F (Cmd+Shift+F on Mac).
• Cross-window functionality: Search tabs from all your Chrome windows.

How it works:
1. Hit Ctrl+Shift+F or click the extension icon.
2. Start typing to search your tabs.
3. Use arrow keys or mouse to select a tab.
4. Press Enter or click to switch to the selected tab.

Quick Tab Search is perfect for:
• Power users juggling multiple projects
• Researchers with numerous reference tabs
• Anyone who wants to boost their browsing efficiency

Say goodbye to tab overload and hello to streamlined browsing. Download Quick Tab Search now and take control of your tabs!
